item.title: First Lesson October 1rst 2020
item.description: Welcome to the first lesson - 01/10/2020 9:30 - 12:30 Zoom meeting We will use Zoom. You can connect to zoom: 1) following this link: (https://us02web.zoom.us/j/81000095315?pwd=Vng2U3FFRDFxVC95S2FPSWhoMXNtQT09) (and, if needed, install the zoom app). 2) or you can start the Zoom app with the following information + meeting ID: 810 0009 5315 + Password: SABD Class platforms Depending on the teacher, we will use Chamilo and/or Caseine I (IragaÃ«l Joly) will try to maintain this blog as a plateform to merge all information and connect to the Caseine and Chamilo plateforms.
